ithin ehema kiyala bogata nogihin innaya neda?me welawata thamayi raththipala ankal kollange pihitata enne.api kalin lipiyaka kiwwa wage hostal eke wadagathma pudgalaya thamayi raththipala ankal.ketiyenma kiyanawanan newasikagara palaka kotiya sarta wada wadagath bogapalaka raththipala.ithin raththipala ankal nirbhitha sinhayek wage ara boga riti pawena wathurata bahinawalu.me bahinne palamak hadanna.

wegawath prathisadhana (yathathathwayata pathkirima) kramopayakata aramudal sapayima wideshiya naya warika washayen wishala mudalak gewiya yuthu bawin ayawaya hingayan sandaha wana pidanaya lihil kirima sandaha bahu parshwiya saha dwiparshwika naya dennangen awurudu 1-3 ka thawakalika sahana kalayak laba ganima.
